data.title: Watch My Family Xmas 2004: Glad Tidings We Bring
data.meta_description: Christmas in the Harper household brings mixed tidings for the family.
data.text:
My Family Xmas 2004: Glad Tidings We Bring

Classic Comedy & Sitcom

More seasonal domestics as Christmas at the Harpers' is something special for everyone. For Susan, the ultimate control opportunity - for Ben, a nightmare.

This programme is not currently available on demand
